name: TheLoveTest
0:
”Alexa, open The Love Test”
”Alexa, ask The Love Test about me and Tom Cruise”
”Alexa, ask The Love Test if I should break up with my partner”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the love test
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Disclaimer: this skill is for entertainment purposes only and does not provide actual relationship advice or compatibility quotients

Can't stop thinking about what could be?
Are you longing to find out if you and the person of your dreams are the perfect match?
Look no further.

Just ask Alexa to open The Love Test! The Love Test will rate your compatibility against your chosen person, and you will finally know if you were destined to be together.

If you find that special person, Alexa will also suggest a poem that you could recite to them. 

Need some relationship advice? You can also ask The Love Test if it thinks you should break up with your partner for a funny response from the love expert!

❤ Things you can say ❤

Ask The Love Test about me and {Name}
Ask The Love Test if I have a chance with {Name}
Ask The Love Test if I should break up with {Name}

For any feedback please contact us at social@vocala.co
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
